motors

Class MotorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • motors.MotorController

  • public class MotorController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows other classes to steer the motor
    Since:
    01-04-2014
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Robert Bezem , Jacob Visser , Pim van Hespen

    • Method Detail

      • driveArc

        public static void driveArc(float turnRadius)
        Will make the robot drive arc with the given radius. Stops when motor is stopped
        Parameters:
        turnRadius - radius in millimeter

      • driveArc

        public static void driveArc(float turnRadius,
            boolean immediateReturn)
        Makes the robot drive a circle with the given radius 'turnRadius'
        Parameters:
        turnRadius - radius in millimeters
        immediateReturn - if true, immediately returns to the next line of code while executing the arc

      • DriveArc

        public static void DriveArc(int radius,
            int degrees,
            boolean immmediateReturn)
        Parameters:
        radius - of the arc in millimeters
        degrees - of the arc to drive
        immmediateReturn - if true, immediately returns to the next line of code while executing the arc

        Will move the robot forward until canceled

        Tells if the robot is moving (true) or isn't (false)
        Returns:
